answers.answer: Medical services for emergency situations, curative medical services for acute conditions, consultations for chronic diseases, detection of diseases with endemic-epidemic potential, consultations for family planning services (counseling, evaluation and monitoring of genito-mammary status, treatment of complications), palliative care services, diagnostic and therapeutic services, pregnancy and pregnancy surveillance services, medical services for diagnostic purposes (day hospitalization services) are included in the basic package.
answers.bResponse: Medical services for emergency situations, curative medical services for acute conditions, consultations for chronic diseases, detection of diseases with endemic-epidemic potential, consultations for family planning services (counseling, evaluation and monitoring of genito-mammary status, treatment of complications), palliative care services, diagnostic and therapeutic services, pregnancy and pregnancy surveillance services, medical services for diagnostic purposes (day hospitalization services) are included in the basic package. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor

answers.answer: Palliative care clinics offer various medical services such as consultations for chronic diseases, detection of diseases with endemic-epidemic potential, and diagnosis and therapeutic services. They also provide palliative care services, which include managing symptoms and improving quality of life for patients facing serious illnesses. Additionally, they offer prenatal and postnatal medical services for pregnant women.

answers.answer: Yes, refugees can access specialized medical services without a referral ticket. They are provided without presenting the referral ticket, which is a form with a special regime used in the social health insurance system.

answers.answer: The type of consultations available for patients with chronic conditions include tracking the evolution of the condition under the treatment established during hospitalization, performing therapeutic procedures, wound examination, thread removal, cast removal, after a surgical or orthopedic intervention, and recommendations for necessary, paraclinical investigations, as appropriate. These consultations may also be offered remotely, by any means of communication, and the presentation of the referral ticket from the family doctor or other specialist doctor is not mandatory.

answers.answer: Examples of services included in day hospitalization are monitoring of normal pregnancy, high-risk pregnancy, prenatal screening, early detection of precancerous lesions of the breast, early detection and diagnosis of dysplastic lesions of the cervix, among others.

answers.answer: The guide states that individuals who have been forcibly displaced or affected by the armed conflict in Ukraine can benefit from the social health insurance system and its associated programs, such as community gardening initiatives. Therefore, those eligible for participation in the community gardening program include individuals from the armed conflict zone in Ukraine.
answers.bResponse: The guide states that individuals who have been forcibly displaced or affected by the armed conflict in Ukraine can benefit from the social health insurance system and its associated programs, such as community gardening initiatives. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor

answers.answer: Yes, individuals from the armed conflict zone have specific rights and benefits when it comes to their enrollment in the social health insurance system as outlined in the "Guide on the rights of people from the armed conflict zone in Ukraine in the social health insurance system", published by the National Health Insurance House.
answers.bResponse: Yes, individuals from the armed conflict zone have specific rights and benefits when it comes to their enrollment in the social health insurance system as outlined in the "Guide on the rights of people from the armed conflict zone in Ukraine in the social health insurance system", published by the National Health Insurance House. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/specialist-doctor

answers.answer: Participating in this community gardening initiative benefits local communities by promoting environmental sustainability, enhancing food security and nutrition, fostering social cohesion, encouraging active living among residents, and contributing to economic development through job creation and market access for locally produced agricultural products.
